T02TD3783E:223a-0: @223a * // bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhugs//
T02TD3783E:223a-2: # // dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
T02TD3783E:223a-3: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD3783E:223a-4: / bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mi bskyod pa //
T02TD3783E:223a-5: rin chen 'byung ldan 'dod pa med dang don yod grub //
T02TD3783E:223a-6: rigs lnga bde gshegs rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02TD3783E:223a-7: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog / rdo rje sems ma dang ni rin chen sems ma dang //
T02TD3783E:223a-8: chos kyi sems ma dang ni las kyi sems mar bcas //
T02TD3783E:223a-9: bcom ldan yum mchog rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02TD3783E:223a-10: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog / rdo rje sems dpa' dang ni rdo rje rgyal po dang //
T02TD3783E:223a-11: rdo rje chags pa dang ni rdo rje legs par bcas //
T02TD3783E:223a-12: bcom ldan mi bskyod 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02TD3783E:223a-13: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog / rdo rje chen dang ni rdo rje gzi brjid dang //
T02TD3783E:223a-14: rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang ni rdo rje bzhad par bcas //
T02TD3783E:223b-0: bcom ldan rin 'byung 'khor @223b gyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02TD3783E:223b-1: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog / rdo rje chos rab dang ni rdo rje rnon po dang //
T02TD3783E:223b-2: rdo rje 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje sma bar bcas //
T02TD3783E:223b-3: bcom ldan snang mtha'i 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02TD3783E:223b-4: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog / rdo rje las rab dang ni rdo rje srung ba dang //
T02TD3783E:223b-5: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang ni rdo rje khu tshur bcas //
T02TD3783E:223b-6: bcom ldan don grub 'khor gyi bkra shis gong yod pa //
T02TD3783E:223b-7: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog / lha mo sgeg mo dang ni lha mo phreng ba ma //
T02TD3783E:223b-8: lha mo glu ma dang ni lha mo gar mar bcas //
T02TD3783E:223b-9: nang gi mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02TD3783E:223b-10: bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bkra shis shog / lha mo bdug spos ma dang lha mo me tog ma //
T02TD3783E:223b-11: lha mo mar me ma dang lha mo dri mar bcas //
T02TD3783E:223b-12: phyi yi mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02TD3783E:223b-13: bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bkra shis shog / sgo ba lcags kyu dang ni sgo ba zhags pa dang //
T02TD3783E:223b-14: sgo ba lcags sgrog dang ni sgo ba dril bur bcas //
T02TD3783E:223b-15: bcom ldan sgo srung rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02TD3783E:223b-16: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog / dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
